config.script: console.log('🔍 提取第一个旺旺链接...'); const offerItems = document.querySelectorAll('.sm-offer-item, .offer-item, .sm-offer, [class*=offer]'); console.log('找到 ' + offerItems.length + ' 个商品项'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(1, offerItems.length); i++) { const item = offerItems[i]; const title = item.querySelector('h4, [class*=title], a[title]'); const wangwangSpan = item.querySelector('span.J_WangWang, span[class*=WangWang]'); const wangwangLink = wangwangSpan ? wangwangSpan.querySelector('a.ww-link') : null; if (wangwangLink && wangwangLink.href) { const merchantName = wangwangSpan.getAttribute('data-nick') || '未知商家'; const decodedName = decodeURIComponent(merchantName); console.log(`找到第一个商家: ${decodedName}`); console.log(`旺旺链接: ${wangwangLink.href}`); return { success: true, merchantName: decodedName, title: title ? title.textContent.trim().substring(0, 50) : '', chatUrl: wangwangLink.href, hasWangWang: true, index: i, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() }; } } return { success: false, error: '未找到有效的旺旺链接', timestamp: new Date().toISOString() };
